channel.title: [Added] Create Org. Identifier XI-IATI-ADVZ for the Agência do Zambeze (Mozambique)
channel.description:
The Agência de Desenvolvimento do Vale do Zambeze of Mozambique requires the following information to be added on their behalf to the IATI Organisation Identifier Codelist at http://iatistandard.org/201/codelists/IATIOrganisationIdentifier/
Code: XI-IATI-ADVZ
Name: Agência de Desenvolvimento do Vale do Zambeze
Description: The Agência do Zambeze is a public-sector agency under the Ministry of Economics and Finance in Mozambique. The mission of the Agência do Zambeze is to promote the socio-economic and sustainable development of the Lower Zambezi River Basin.
URL: http://www.inm.gov.mz/?q=pt-pt/ag%C3%AAncia-de-desenvolvimento-do-vale-do-zambeze

item.title: [Added] Create Org. Identifier XI-IATI-ADVZ for the Agência do Zambeze (Mozambique)
item.dc:creator: IATI-techteam
item.description:
The IATI tech team approved this addition to the XI-IATI Organisation identifier codelist as a stable identifiers for departments or agencies in Mozambique is currently not available.

Read full topic
